about_the_game:
Do you like birds? How about worlds? Are you perhaps trying to bury a hatchet that keeps poking out from the dirt? Well have we got the game for you! Come on down to birdworld, the eldritch role playing game about facing your dark past.

birdworld features a loveable cast of feathery friends, monsters with protruding bones, and puzzles that'll make you say "WOW, I'M HAVING FUN!"

Your story is entirely your own! Guide Adam (your adorable main character) through an unforgiving landscape, which you may find twisting and turning with each save file you pursue. That's right! There are so many birds to meet and so many trinkets to obtain that you'd be A FOOL to think that you're playing the same game twice! Or thrice! Or maybe more...

EVERYTHING MATTERS.

So don't wait, download birdworld RIGHT NOW! The button is waiting, and you know you want to...

We are not responsible for related side effects such as rapid skeletal transformation, loss of teeth, foggy memory, or death. By entering the hole you are agreeing to seal your fate into a contract with omnipotent forces that may only be fulfilled by completing all five levels. 

Call 555-8907 to close the trap.

FOR PURPOSE OF ASSESSMENT WE HAVE BEEN ADVISED TO INFORM CUSTOMERS OF EVERY BLATANT DETAIL REGARDING THE BIRDWORLD EXPERIENCE. IF YOU WISH TO KEEP YOUR PRECIOUS IGNORANCE AND HAVE A TRULY BIRD-TASTIC EXPERIENCE, IGNORE THIS SECTION AND PROCEED TO THE NON-THREATENING CREDITS SECTION OF OUR 'ABOUT THIS' PAGE.

Birdworld is a single-player, two tone, turn based combat, puzzle/mystery solving experience. The gameplay balances all of these mechanics in a one-of-a-kind package, tailored directly to how you project yourself onto the main character. Control with WASD, or arrow keys, ENTER, and ESCAPE. You will not need a mouse, though some mouse inputs have a similar effect as your intended keybinds would. Birdworld features instances of horror, tragedy, and nudity. Nudity may be toggled, but not entirely removed, through an item that is obtained before the first instance. Battles are encountered through overworld interactions, not random chance in the wild. You have access to several actions during your turn and can recruit other characters to help you wail on monsters more efficiently. Birdworld is in no way meant to be erotic through its themes of nudity, but is meant to strengthen its absurdity and increasingly harrowing tale. Several endings and routes are available to discover, and only several attempts at beating the game will reward you with different outcomes. Does it really matter? That's for you to find out.

Lead Dev & Soundtrack: Ramona Sittel

3D Modeling: Nuckle

Special Thanks: Matt McTiernan, Caleb "Surzy", Jack Carrasquillo, & CJKB

SFX: Zapsplat

Version 0.0.2

content_descriptors.notes: birdworld displays occasional nudity in artistic form. birdworld is in no way meant to sexually arouse through it's imagery, and any instance is heavily important to the surreal tone of the game. Nudity may be toggled via an item that is obtained before the first instance.
